description: This file sets up an asynchronous agent using the 'agno' library, configured with a specific model, and runs an asynchronous response printing method for a given prompt.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent capable of processing prompts and generating responses asynchronously.

classes.name: Together
classes.description: Model class representing a specific language model configuration.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Executes a prompt asynchronously, returning an iterator over response events.

methods.name: agent.aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously prints the response for a given prompt.
